Uses of Package
org.kiji.schema.zookeeper

Packages that use org.kiji.schema.zookeeper
org.kiji.schema.zookeeper Contains classes for interacting with ZooKeeper including utilities and recipes specific to Kiji. 
 

Classes in org.kiji.schema.zookeeper used by org.kiji.schema.zookeeper
InstanceUserRegistration
          Registers an instance user with ZooKeeper.
TableLayoutTracker
          Tracks the layout of a table and updates a registered handler.
TableLayoutUpdateHandler
          Interface for objects that wish to be notified when a table's layout changes.
TableUserRegistration
          Registers a table user with ZooKeeper.
TableUsersTracker
           
TableUsersUpdateHandler
          Interface for objects that wish to be notified when a table's current users change.
ZooKeeperLock
          Distributed lock on top of ZooKeeper.
